short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring local inference into web apps !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-Mask is a web extension that serves as a gateway to AI models execution. 
It runs model on-device for apps which needs it, for free, and with full-privacy.

See it as the Metamask of AI.

Run models like Llama2, Gemma, Mistral, straight on your computer, for free !

Artificial Intelligence, WASM, WebGPU, transformers, transformers.js, mlc, web-llm
